title: Population age structure in metropolitan areas in the U.S .
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 10 different Areas on X-axis for 5 groups Under 18 years, 18 to 44 years, 45 to 64 years, 65 to 74 years, and 75 years and over. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Number of residents.

In Area New York - Northern New Jersey - Long Island NY-NJ-PA, 18 to 44 years had the highest Number of residents 7135783.0 among the 5 groups and in Atlanta - Sandy Springs - Marietta GA, 75 years and over had the lowest Number of residents 195916.0.
In Area New York - Northern New Jersey - Long Island NY-NJ-PA, 18 to 44 years had the maximum Number of residents and it saw the lowest in Area Boston - Cambridge - Quincy MA-NH out of all 10 Areas.

The maximum Number of residents for 18 to 44 years that was found in Area New York - Northern New Jersey - Long Island NY-NJ-PA was 4.06 times larger than the minimum Number of residents observed in Area Boston - Cambridge - Quincy MA-NH.

In Area New York - Northern New Jersey - Long Island NY-NJ-PA, 18 to 44 years had the highest Number of residents 7135783.0 among the 5 groups and in Atlanta - Sandy Springs - Marietta GA, 75 years and over had the lowest Number of residents 195916.0.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 10 different Areas on X-axis for 5 groups Under 18 years, 18 to 44 years, 45 to 64 years, 65 to 74 years, and 75 years and over. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Number of residents.

Out of all 5 groups, 18 to 44 years had the highest Number of residents in Area New York - Northern New Jersey - Long Island NY-NJ-PA and 75 years and over had the lowest Number of residents in Area Atlanta - Sandy Springs - Marietta GA.

In Area New York - Northern New Jersey - Long Island NY-NJ-PA, 18 to 44 years had the highest Number of residents among all 10 Areas and it has the lowest Number of residents in Area Boston - Cambridge - Quincy MA-NH.

There is a gap of 5377607.0 between the highest and lowest Number of residents found for 18 to 44 years in Area New York - Northern New Jersey - Long Island NY-NJ-PA and Boston - Cambridge - Quincy MA-NH.
Among the groups, 18 to 44 years had the biggest difference in Number of residents. Where the maximum Number of residents was 4.06 times larger than the minimum Number of residents.

18 to 44 years had the maximum Number of residents out of all 5 groups in Area New York - Northern New Jersey - Long Island NY-NJ-PA followed by 18 to 44 years in New York - Northern New Jersey - Long Island NY-NJ-PA, and the minimum Number of residents is found for 75 years and over in Atlanta - Sandy Springs - Marietta GA.

Averaging all 5 groups Under 18 years, 18 to 44 years, 45 to 64 years, 65 to 74 years, and 75 years and over, the Area New York - Northern New Jersey - Long Island NY-NJ-PA is the maximum Number of residents and Boston - Cambridge - Quincy MA-NH is the minimum Number of residents.
